title: Which is the best ladies shop in Dhaka, Bangladesh? - Quora

response.answer_text: Best ladies shop in Bangladesh? Best shop, is a relative term. And there is no such specific assessment criteria as well. It might differ from place to place, product to product also customer age, purchase power, education etc. Here I am considering only market in Dhaka City not the whole country. I can remember among students or ex students in Dhaka City, “CHADNI CHWAK” in Nilkhet is one of the most popular market for 3 pieces and other dresses. This place is very popular among girls for variety of supply and reasonable price. Also there are many good tailoring shops for ladies in this place which also made this market very popular. Ladies having medium to high purchase power like to shop in “Bashundhara City Mall”. This place has good outlets for: ShareesJewelry & OrnamentsCosmeticsUndergarmentsShooesMobile phonesEtcLadies like to shop this place for good environment plus movie halls and food courts. “BENERASHI PALLI” in Mirpur is very popular among ladies for Katan shares. For wedding shopping this place is very popular specially among medium income group due to its diversication, quality and cost. For exclusive shopping lading like to visit “AARONG” most. It is the home of exclusive shares, dresses, handicraft, home decoration, kids dresses etc. It is an excellent place to shop for family and gifts. “DHAKA NEW MARKET” is always a top choice among ladies for all types of items including jewelry, shares, dresses, kid items, kitchen items, home decor, students etc. It is full of necessary items at a reasonable price. Ladies like to shop here and enjoy its Fuska and chopoti a lot. There are many other popular shops in Dhaka for ladies including Pink city, Jamuna Future Park, Rapa Plaza, Eastern Plaza many more can come in this list. Sorry if your favourite shop name is not mentioned here.
